00174 class vtkCamera;
00175 class vtkVolumeProperty;
00176 class vtkProperty;
00177 class vtkProp3D;
00178 class vtkActor;
00179 class vtkVolume;

00186 
00187 typedef std::map<std::string, const mxArray*> MxMap;
00188 
00189 class SceneConfiguration {
00190 
00191 public:
00192 
00193     void AddConfigStruct(const mxArray *configStruct) {
00194         if(configStruct != NULL && mxIsStruct(configStruct)) {
00195             int numFields = mxGetNumberOfFields(configStruct);
00196             
00197             for(int i=0; i<numFields; i++) {
00198                 const char* name = mxGetFieldNameByNumber(configStruct, i);
00199                 const mxArray *data = mxGetField(configStruct, 0, name);
00200                 values[name] = data;
00201                 mexDebug("adding struct field: %s\n", name);
00202             }
00203         }
00204         else mexWarnMsgTxt("ignoring invalid config: not a struct.");
00205         }
00206     
00207     void AddConfigList(const mxArray **configList, int fromIdx, int total) {
00208         if(total<=fromIdx || (total-fromIdx)%2 != 0) {
00209             mexWarnMsgTxt("ignoring invalid config list.");
00210             return;
00211         }
00212         
00213         for(int i=fromIdx; i+1<total; i=i+2) {
00214             char* name = mxArrayToString(configList[i]);
00215             const mxArray *data = configList[i+1];
00216             mexDebug("adding list entry: %s\n", name);
00217             values[name] = data;
00218         }
00219         
00220         }
00221     
00222     const mxArray* GetField(std::string name) {
00223         const mxArray *data = NULL;
00224         if(values.find(name) != values.end()) data = values[name];
00225         return data;
00226     }
00227     
00228     void SetField(std::string key, mxArray* value) {
00229         if(value != NULL)
00230             values[key] = value;
00231         
00232         return;
00233         }
00234     
00235     mxArray* AsMxStruct() {
00236         return NULL;
00237         }
00238     
00239     mxArray* AsMxList() {
00240         return NULL;
00241         }
00242     
00243     bool HasField(std::string name) {
00244         return (GetField(name) != NULL);
00245         }
00246     
00247     bool IsScalar(std::string name) {
00248         return (HasField(name) && check_scalar(GetField(name)));
00249     }
00250     
00251     bool IsPointer(std::string name, int len=3) {
00252         return (HasField(name) && check_vector(GetField(name), len));
00253     }
00254     
00255     bool IsString(std::string name) {
00256         return (HasField(name) && mxIsChar(GetField(name)));
00257     }
00258 
00259     bool IsOn(std::string name) {
00260         return (IsScalar(name) && GetScalar(name) != 0);
00261     }
00262     
00263     double GetScalar(std::string name) {
00264         const mxArray *field = GetField(name);
00265         if(field) return mxGetScalar(field);
00266 
00267         return -1.0;
00268     }
00269     
00270     double* GetPointer(std::string name) {
00271         const mxArray *field = GetField(name);
00272         if(field) return mxGetPr(field);
00273         
00274         return NULL;
00275     }
00276     
00277     int GetStringValue(std::string name);
00278     
00279     // does not seem to work :-(
00280     // template<typename T>
00281     // void Configure(T *prop);
00282     
00283     // convenience function, propagates down to vtkProp3D
00284     void Configure(vtkProperty *prop);
00285     void Configure(vtkVolumeProperty *prop);
00286     void Configure(vtkProp3D *prop);
00287     void Configure(vtkActor *actor);
00288     void Configure(vtkCubeAxesActor *axes);
00289     void Configure(vtkCamera *camera);
00290     void Configure(vtkTextProperty *prop);
00291     void Configure(vtkTextActor *prop);
00292     void Configure(vtkRenderer *ren);
00293     void Configure(vtkSphereSource *ssource);
00294     void Configure(vtkImplicitPlaneWidget2* plane);
00295     void Configure(vtkBoxWidget2 *box);
00296 
00297     void Export(vtkProp3D *prop, mxArray *mxExport);
00298     void Export(vtkCamera *camera, mxArray *mxExport);
00299     void Export(vtkImplicitPlaneWidget2* plane, mxArray *mxExport);
00300     void Export(vtkBoxWidget2 *box, mxArray *mxExport);
00301 
00302      protected:
00303      StringTable table;
00304      MxMap values;   
00305 
00306 private:
00307     //const mxArray* config;
00308     //int dummyStruct;
00309 };
00310 
00311 // call correct overloaded functions
00312 class CameraWrapper {
00313 
00314     public:
00315     CameraWrapper(vtkCamera *camera) : camera(camera) {
00316         }
00317     
00318     double* GetFocalPoint() { return camera->GetFocalPoint(); }
00319     void SetFocalPoint(double *fp) { camera->SetFocalPoint(fp); }
00320     
00321     void SetPosition(double *d) {  camera->SetPosition(d);     }
00322     double *GetPosition() { return camera->GetPosition(); }
00323     
00324     void SetViewUp(double *d) { camera->SetViewUp(d); }
00325     double* GetViewUp() { return camera->GetViewUp(); }
00326     
00327     
00328     private:
00329     vtkCamera *camera;
00330 };
00331 
00332 class BoxRepresentationWrapper {
00333 
00334   public:
00335   BoxRepresentationWrapper(vtkBoxRepresentation *box) {
00336     this->box = box;
00337 
00338     planes = vtkPlanes::New();
00339     box->GetPlanes(planes);
00340   }
00341 
00342   ~BoxRepresentationWrapper() {
00343       planes->Delete();
00344   }
00345 
00346   void SetNormals(double *d) {
00347     int len=6;
00348     vtkDoubleArray *n = vtkDoubleArray::New();
00349    n->SetNumberOfComponents(3);
00350    n->Allocate(len);
00351 
00352     for(int i=0; i<len; i++) {
00353       n->InsertTuple3(i, d[i], d[len+i], d[2*len+i]);
00354         mexDebug("setting normal: %f, %f, %f\n", d[i], d[len+i], d[2*len+i]);
00355 
00356     }
00357 
00358     planes->SetNormals(n);
00359     n->Delete();
00360 
00361     // this way planes are always normal to x/y/z axis :-(
00362     //box->SetPlaceFactor(1.0);
00363     //box->PlaceWidget(b);
00364     //box->BuildRepresentation();
00365   }
00366 
00367   void SetPoints(double *d) {
00368     int len=6;
00369     vtkDoubleArray *n = vtkDoubleArray::New();
00370    n->SetNumberOfComponents(3);
00371    n->Allocate(len);
00372 
00373     for(int i=0; i<len; i++) {
00374       n->InsertTuple3(i, d[i], d[len+i], d[2*len+i]);
00375     }
00376 
00377     planes->GetPoints()->SetData(n);
00378     n->Delete();
00379 
00380     // this way planes are always normal to x/y/z axis :-(
00381     box->SetPlaceFactor(1.0);
00382     box->PlaceWidget(planes->GetPoints()->GetBounds());
00383     //box->BuildRepresentation();
00384   }
00385 
00386   double* GetNormals() {
00387     //return planes->GetNormals()->GetPointer(0);
00388 
00389      int c=6;
00390     for(int i=0; i<c; i++) {
00391       double *xyz = planes->GetNormals()->GetTuple3(i);
00392       mexDebug("reading normal: %f, %f, %f\n", xyz[0], xyz[1], xyz[2]);
00393       normals[i] = xyz[0];
00394       normals[c+i] = xyz[1];
00395       normals[2*c+i] = xyz[2];
00396     }
00397 
00398     return normals;
00399 
00400 
00401   }
00402 
00403   double* GetPoints() {
00404 
00405     int c=6;
00406     for(int i=0; i<c; i++) {
00407       double *xyz = planes->GetPoints()->GetPoint(i);
00408       points[i] = xyz[0];
00409       points[c+i] = xyz[1];
00410       points[2*c+i] = xyz[2];
00411     }
00412 
00413     return points;
00414         //planes->GetPoints()->GetData()->GetPointer(0);
00415   }
00416 
00417 
00418   private:
00419   double points[18];
00420   double normals[18];
00421   vtkPlanes* planes;
00422   vtkBoxRepresentation *box;
00423 
00424 };
00425 
00426 
00427 #endif
